metadata.title: CVE-2020-1770 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Support bundle generated files could contain sensitive information thatmight be unwanted to be disclosed. This issue affects: ((OTRS)) CommunityEdition: 5.0.41 and prior versions, 6.0.26 and prior versions. OTRS: 7.0.15and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
